about_the_game:
Welcome to the frontline of "Ants with Guns," where the insect world meets modern warfare! Experience the scientifically accurate battle simulator that brings ants to the forefront of the battlefield, armed with newfound firepower.

So now you can make ants battle for queen and candy in this new breed of sandbox battle simulator.

Features:

  • Ants packing heat:

    Take command of an army of ants armed to the mandibles with an array of tiny yet powerful firearms.

  • Flying Units Dogfights:

    Engage in intense dogfights with flying units, or man the anti-aircraft guns and bring down the airborne onslaught. The choice is yours.

  • Spider Tanks:

    Witness the might of GIANT spider tanks, adding a colossal twist to the battlefield. Face off against massive spiders and tackle kaiju-sized monster bug bosses in epic showdowns.

  • Direct Ant Control:

    Immerse yourself in the action by directly controlling your ant soldiers in first or third person. It's an ant's-eye view of the battlefield, and it's armed to the antennae.

  • Named Units and Epic Demises:

    Get to know each ant by name, forging a personal connection just before they heroically (or tragically) meet their fate. Every ant has a story – even if it's only five seconds long.

  • Strategic Terrain Warfare:

    Navigate through diverse terrains, turning your kitchen into a war zone. Ants are the culinary commandos, and your fridge is their fortress.

  • Royal Rumbles for Royal Jelly:

    Lead your ant army to victory in battles for the queen and epic clashes over coveted candy resources. It's like a royal buffet, but with more combat strategy.

  • Kaiju Bugs:

    tackle kaiju-sized monster bug bosses in epic showdowns.

Dive into the world of "Ants with Guns" – where war is small in scale but big on excitement! Command your ant troops, witness epic battles, and explore a battlefield like no other. After all, ants have been warriors longer than we've been players.

*No ants were harmed in the creation of this game; or maybe they were …who cares they're ants.

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-7200U CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 940MX
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

Recommended:
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Ants with guns is a sandbox battle simulator that lets you play with ants and have them battle one another like you were a child again or if you're in your childhood it lets you do what you probably already do. Except a lot cooler than your childhood because they’ve got guns... and rocket flies.
